human_nature.apprehensive: worried that something bad will happen
human_nature.assertive: expressing opinions or desires strongly and with confidence, so that people take notice
human_nature.compassionate: feeling or showing sympathy and concern for others
human_nature.clumsy: moving in a way that is not controlled or careful, and often causing damage or injury
human_nature.cynical: believing that people are only interested in themselves and are not sincere
human_nature.egotistical: thinking that you are better or more important than other people
human_nature.gullible: easily deceived or tricked, and too willing to believe everything that other people say
human_nature.self-conscious: nervous or uncomfortable because you are worried about what people think about you or your actions
human_nature.sensible: able to make good judgments based on reason and experience rather than emotion
human_nature.tactful: careful not to say or do anything that could upset someone
